content:
pchickey commented on issue #7031:

@eduardomourar we're finally underway with the big renovations of wasmtime-wasi-http to get it integrated with wasmtime-wasi streams and pollables. So, you may want to hold off on working on it for a little bit

eduardomourar commented on issue #7031:

@pchickey and @alexcrichton, i would appreciate if we can get this approved and merged. Also, this need to be backported to v13 branch, but i need some guidance on what it needs to be ported there.
